entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Esquimalt Harbour 12:00 AM PST Friday 30 December 2022

Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: 5.7°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain beginning late this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near Haro Strait overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
